rows.label: qev092203_MSG0001
rows.name: Friends finally here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0001_2
rows.name:
Caravan was attacked again
while waiting for friends to arrive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0002
rows.name: Pollen orbs stolen! Lularita injured! This is worst day ever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_JNK0010
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev092203_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Lularita if she is all right.

rows.label: qev092203_JNK0020
rows.name: Dismiss

rows.label: qev092203_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Lularita that she looks fine.

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0003
rows.name:
Lularita is toughest warrior in caravan.
Stronger than bull made of rocks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0004
rows.name:
Still, nasty scrape takes three days to heal.
Monsters will pay in blood![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0005
rows.name: Then look closer! Wing of Lularita have nasty scrape.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0006
rows.name:
Monsters very powerful to inflict such
grave harm on best warrior of caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0007
rows.name:
Now Lularita tell friends location of monster den
so friends can make with killing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0008
rows.name: Okay! We'll do whatever it takes so you all can live in peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0009
rows.name: Whatever they are, I'm sure you can handle them. Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev092203_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Hope that you have everything under control.

rows.label: qev092203_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev092203_SEL0041
rows.name:
Tell Hope that she needs to
pull her weight on this mission.

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0010
rows.name: I've never worked with anyone this reliable before. Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0011
rows.name:
It's so rare to be on the receiving end of help like this,
you know? It feels...good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0012
rows.name: Yes, of course. I'll do my best to keep you safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0013
rows.name: All right. Let's move out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0014
rows.name:
Monsters are powerful enough to outmatch best warrior
in whole caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0015
rows.name:
Could be too much even for friends.
Prepare well before heading to battle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0016
rows.name: Oh! Friends back safe and alive![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0017
rows.name: Did friends avenge Lularita's wing scrape?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0018
rows.name:
We did. This caravan will never
have to fear those creatures again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0019
rows.name: Oh-ho! Lularita was right to ask friends for help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0020
rows.name: And for free, no less. What savings![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0020_2
rows.name: Five stars for you! Would use again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_JNK0050
rows.name: Grumble

rows.label: qev092203_SEL0051
rows.name:
Say that you deserve at least
some thanks, if not payment.

rows.label: qev092203_JNK0060
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev092203_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Lularita you're happy to help anytime.

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0021_m
rows.name:
Why is friend so angry?
"Free" is happiest, bestest word in Nopon language.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0021_f
rows.name:
Why is friend so angry?
"Free" is happiest, bestest word in Nopon language.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0022
rows.name: It's true, Nopon do all grin at the mention of savings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0023
rows.name: But if you're upset for my sake, I appreciate the thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0024
rows.name:
You're the only person aside from Ornella
who's ever shown me such consideration...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0025
rows.name:
People tell me I'm a pushover,
but you give me a run for the money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0026
rows.name: Lularita have plenty of things new friends can help with![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0027
rows.name: Roof of hut leak in rain... Laundry piling up...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0028
rows.name: I'm glad we had a chance to do this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0029
rows.name: I hope we can work together again sometime?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0030
rows.name: Though for now, I should get back to Ornella.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0031
rows.name:
That'll also give me time to put together
a suitable reward for your kindness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0032
rows.name:
Rumors of magical wish-granting girl Hope are also
popular among Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0033
rows.name:
Lularita will definitely be back to New LA to ask for
more, so look forward to that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0034
rows.name: Oh, and it still for free, right? Riiiiiight?![ST:wait ]
